documents.document: Location - Location - Location PROS:2 minute walk from Downtown Crossing.Free internet access.Rooms clean and comfortable.Staff friendly and efficient.Seperate pub restaurant on site - The Elephant Castle.CONS:Bathroom tiny.No sound proofing between rooms, it is possible to hear the television in the room next door.The attached pub / restaurant is extremely busy and crowded with after work socialisers.OVERALL:A good experience and for the price, we would definitely stay again.

Great Location Both myself and my wife stayed here for 2 nights in December 2006. Our room was a suite overlooking Darling Harbour. The room was clean, comfortable, very large and luxurious.We found the hotel employees to be very courteous and attentative.The big selling point of this hotel is it's close proximity to all sights in Sydney and the views over Darling Harbour.
